full_summary:
## **Project: Characterization of Grouts for In-Situ Disposal Projects** ### **Tender Details** * **Solicitation Number:** 5000074343C * **Reference Number:** 861-44001026 * **Publication Date:** May 13, 2024 * **Tender Closing Date:** June 10, 2024, 11:00 AM (ET) * **Contracting Agency:** Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) * **Location:** Ottawa, Ontario ### **Background** The CNSC Innovation and Research Division (IRD) is seeking research services to support the assessment of the grouts proposed for use in In-Situ Disposal (ISD) projects at the Nuclear Power Demonstration (NPD) and Whiteshell Reactor 1 (WR-1). ### **Project Description** The CNSC requires a detailed report describing and presenting the results of an experimental program aimed at characterizing certain properties of the two grouts expected to be used by the Canadian Nuclear Laboratories (CNL) for the NPD and WR-1 ISD projects. ### **Key Requirements** * Deliver a comprehensive report on the experimental program * Present results in a detailed and structured format * Collaborate with CNSC staff to validate assumptions in safety analysis reports * Ensure that the proposed grouts meet their function in the ISD projects ### **Proposal Submission** Prospective bidders are required to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) in accordance with the tender notice. ### **Important Dates** * **Tender Closing Date:** June 10, 2024, 11:00 AM (ET) * **Amendment Date:** June 10, 2024 ### **Contact Information** For further information, please contact: Daniel Tilsley Phone: (343) 542-6886 Email: [solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca](mailto:solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca)
### **Attachments** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38033/5000074343c---amendment-001.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38033/5000074343c---rfp.pdf
